high_descs: Go toward the wall, turn left, go to the small white dresser, and turn right.
Take a candle from the small white dresser.
Turn left, go to the bath tub, turn left, and go to the toilet.
Put the candle on the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on the toilet.

high_descs: Walk forward and left to the small cabinet right of the sink
Pick up the left most candle from the cabinet
Turn around and walk up to the toilet
Put the candle down on top of the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Put the candle on the toilet

high_descs: Move to the left and face the white stand next to the sink.
Pick the candle up from the back left corner.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.
